## add() function

Adds two numbers.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function add(a: number, b: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  a | number | The first number. |
|  b | number | The second number. |

**Returns:**

number

{<!-- -->number<!-- -->} The sum of a and b.
